text: Kuma kada ku kasance kamar wadda ta warware zarenta a bayan tukka, ya zama warwararku, kuna riƙon rantsuwoyinku domin yaudara a tsakaninku, domin kasancewar wata al'umma tafi riba daga wata al'umma! Abin sani kawai Allah Yana jarrabar ku da shi, kuma lalle ne yana bayyana muku a Ranar ¡iyama, abin da kuka kasance, a cikinsa, kuna saɓa wajuna
